choices: Go further/Interact with the coming shoe
1.content:
Your name is Will Lincoln. You are a 24 year old businessman, and flying around the world comes standard with the job. At 5'11 and with brown hair and a fit body, you are very attractive, and though many women have sought you, you still remain single. You consider yourself to be an All-American, hailing from the U.S. and taking pride in it.
         You were currently at London Heathrow airport, waiting for a connection to India. Sitting in the seat at the gate, you began to tire of the constant flow of people in front of you when a voice blared over an intercom.
"Passengers on Flight 4768 to New Delhi, I'm sorry to say that your flight will be delayed. There is a bad storm in its path from Casablanca, and they will have to divert through Paris. We are looking at a two to three hour delay. We apologize for the inconvenience."
The entire gate groaned, and you were one of them. Deciding that you couldn't take sitting any longer, you decided to take a walk. You shuffled through the stifling amount of people trying to look for anything to hold your interest for the hours you had to wait. After a few minutes of aimless wandering you happened upon a large food court. It seemed to be focused at the center of the airport, as there were dozens of stands for food and a few hundred people. You walk into the food court and begin to decide what you are hungry for.
As you ponder, you feel a stinging sensation in your neck. You curse under your breath and begin rubbing your neck where you felt the pain. After a few seconds, the pain subsides, and you dismiss it as a twinge. You make your decision and make your way to the good ol' American McDonalds. But just as you begin to move, you black out.

You awaken on the ground. You can tell something is different, but you have no idea what. As you are trying to find out, it nearly hits you...literally. A high heel comes within a few feet (to you) of crushing you. "SHIT!" you curse as you are knocked on your ass from the impact of the shoe. You see another high heel land, fortunately on the further side from you, before being picked up and moved again. Following those high heels, two pairs of beaten sneakers follow. Fortunately, you are well enough out of the way that you are not impacted by the sneakers, but you are still in shock. Doing a bit of quick math, you determine that you can't be higher than 1 inch tall.

You see that the three pairs of shoes have arrived at a table a short distance away, and you look up to their owners. Three Arab women owned the shoes, and were sitting with salads at the table nearby. Two of the women were wearing hijabs, and the third one had long flowing black hair. They appeared to be very different ages; one of the hijab women appeared in her 60s, the other appeared in her early 40s, and the girl without the hijab, who also had the high heels, appeared about your age; 25 or so. You weren't sure you could trust the women who had just tried to kill you, so you looked around at the other tables to see if there occupants might appear more helpful.

As you looked around, you spotted another group of women. There was what appeared to be an Indian Mother and Daughter eating Chinese food at a nearby table. You recognized them as two who had been sitting at your same gate. They could be your ticket back to the gate. The Mother looked to be in her late 30s, and daughter had to be either 16 or 17. This could be your best bet, but they appeared very unhappy with each other. The daughter was screaming at the mother very fast in Hindi. Sure you knew a bit of the language, but at the speed she was going, you had no hope of translating. All you knew was that she was mad, and that could be bad for you.

A bit further on, you saw an Asian family of 4 with a family pack of McDonalds. The mother was in her late 40s, and she had kids that looked to be about 15, 11, and 7. You might be able to hitch a ride with them, as they provide the most possible hiding places, but kids can be rough, and the mother looks like she has about had it with the children.

Lastly, there was a group of Latina Coeds. Three girls, who all looked stunning. They would certainly be the go to option to pick up chicks, but you have heard about the fierce Latina temper, and you weren't sure you wanted to mess with them.

Those were your options. One didn't really appeal above the other. But you knew that you would have to choose. Then an idea popped into your head. You could go a bit further down and see if there were any better options down there. As you were thinking, you noticed another set of shoes going for you. You knew that had to make a decision, or you could be kicked or crushed by those shoes. So you made your choice...
1.title: Let it Begin

The two women dressed differently, but each was extremely attractive. The mother was skinny, and her form-fitting business suit exemplified her ass and boobs even when sitting down. 14.content:
You look over to the three Latina Coeds and decide to press your luck. Considering that you shrunk, you doubt anyone would be able to help you which only left you with one option. Make the best out of your situation. You hadn't noticed it before, but you felt as if you had unlimited strength in your legs, more then you had ever felt before. You decided to test it out by running towards the Coeds and you felt yourself start running at a speed that would put Usain bolt to shame (If he was tiny as well). On the way, you had suddenly felt yourself being knocked down by some kind of rubber and then surrounded on all sides by it.

The experience wasn't painful, but when the pressure left you saw exactly what had happened. You were stepped on by an unaware passerby. This had given you much more insight into exactly what your limits were. Your body was more sturdy and you felt no pain. You could run at incredible speeds and you assumed you could also climb super fast. This was becoming more and more like you were ant-man, and that gave you ideas. You got back up and continued the run towards the trio of beautiful coeds and stopped.

The first girl had no carry-on to speak of, presumably because her friends had her stuff with them. She was wearing Sandals and long jeans with a low cut shirt.

The second girl seemed to be the pack mule. She had 3 small bags on her arms and had noticeably more muscle then the other two girls. She was wearing a pair of sneakers and socks, along with a pair of workout shorts and a tank-top. You couldn't tell before, but now that you were closer you could tell she was really sweaty which you suppose at such a small size could be pretty hot.

The third girl was similar to the first girl except the fact that you could smell the extreme perfume surrounding her and could see the makeup caked on her face. This was presumably the Fashionista of the group and your experience with Fashionista's is that they were usually very vain and bossy, looking down on everyone. This was the worst girl to get caught by.

You then had the choice of which girl to perv on, and by weighing the risks and rewards you chose...
14.title: The Latina Coeds

choices: A white woman with blonde hair, the flight is to Finland
An asian woman, the flight is to Japan
A black woman, the flight is to South Africa
A latina woman, the flight is to Brazil
A muslim woman, the flight is to Abu Dabi
15.content:
Turning around to check on the position of the incoming shoes, you realize you took too long to make a decision as they are almost upon you. Improvising you jump up as they pass over you and you grab hold of the right shoe, scrambling up you pull your legs over to the top just as the foot stomps down sending a shockwave throughout the shoe and you by extention. As the woman walks you hear the intercom over head "Flight 256 please get ready to board the plane, thank you." suddenly the woman's pace quickens.

Coming in at almost running speed the woman stops at the boarding port and gets her ticket checked, she then swiftly boards the plane. As you look up still slightly recovering from trying to hold on during the run you notice that you're on a plane, franticly you look around the plane for any sign of where the flight's headed when you see it on a tv and your heart drops.

Looking up at the woman that you're on the shoe of for the first time you realize that she's...
15.title: Go further/Interact with the coming shoe

choices: You lose your grip and fall in
You grab hold o her coat and pull yourself out
151.content:
Looking away from the tv, you look up at the woman who's shoe you hitchiked here on. Blonde hair so light it's nearly white, deep blue eyes, a small pointed nose, a pair of small but cute lips and a rounded firm but friendly chin, she has a friendly smile on looking down at her phone, if you ever decided to start dating you would definately ask her out. Now all you have to do is get her attention before the plane takes off, scrap that, maybe just get her attention, you think of yourself as an optimist but even you know you're not going to get noticed in two minutes, you're one inch, she'll think you're a bug if anything from up there. As you look up at this woman you decide if you're going to get he attention you're going to do it from close up so she doesn't mistake you for a bug.

Marking the start of your climb, you grab a firm hold on the bottom of her black jeans, her entire leg should take you around half an hour, looking further up you note that her upper body should take less time as her coat looks alot easier to grab hold of. You start climbing but the plane begins to take off and is shaking alot making it way harder to climb than it already is. Eventually after a few minutes the shaking stops and you continue the ascent up the giantess's leg, the climbing is difficult but after 14 minutes you reach her knee, since she is sitting down the rest of her leg will be alot easier. In what you thought would take you half an hour ended up taking only 20 minutes, during your small celebration of walking around in a circle and fist pumping you trip as the giantess begins to stand up, the flight is nowhere bear being over so this can only mean that she's headed for the bathroom, when you trip one of your legs is caught in the waistband of her pants...
151.title: Scaling the finnish mountain

choices: The coat you're in is hung up
You're still in the coat with the woman but something's off
You wake up in the palm of the woman's hand
1512.content:
When the giantess starts walking you franticly grab at anything you can to avoid falling, you manage to clutch onto her coat and pull your leg out of the waistband. Since her coat is unzipped you pull yourself up a bit and then shift to the side and go around the zipper and to the inside of the coat. It is quite alot warmer in here and you soon spot an inner coat pocket to seek refuge in, you continue to pull yourself up until you can grab hold of the inner pocket, you clutch the top with both of your hands and tumble into the pocket. You're safe for now but eventually you need to get out of here and continue your climb, it shoulden't be much further though seeing as this pocket is around stomache level.

You decide to wait here for a bit, get a bit of rest, and, clear your mind for a bit, not long after you lau down to rest you start to hear gurgling noises, quite quickly you connect the dots, your pocket is stomache level after all. Considering moving the a higher or lower hiding spot you stop yourself, you're already here, and the noises are actually surprisingly soothing to listen to, you decide to stay and soon fall asleep due to a combination of the darkness, warmth, and soothing sounds lulling you to sleep.

Eventually you wake up again...
1512.title: Saved for now

choices: Fall into the finnish woman's shoe
Regain your balance and back up
15121.content:
Slowly you open your eyes, something's different, climbing up the inner pocket o the coat you peek your head over the top of the pocket, nothing but darkness, as you breathe in you nose is filled with the familiar smell of the finnish giantess which you've come accustomed to. You slowly pull yourself up and over the side of the pocket and start to lower yourself down the inside of the coat, looking downwards you see the floor a ways away, the coat must be hung up. Looking for a way down that wont kill you, you spot a scarf disgarded on the ground close by. Making a gamble you swing back and forth on the bottem of the coat building momentum, at just the right moment you let go and start falling towards the scarf.

After a small thumb you stand up and feel all your body parts, everything's in place so you jump off the scarf and look around.
Noticing the darkness you look at the window, you must've slept for longer than you thought, looking back around the room you notice that you seem to be in the entry way of a small apartment.
Stepping forwards a bit you notice that the entry area is raised a step up higher than the hallway ahead of it. As you walk to the edge you notice a smell, it's distant at first but the closer you get to the edge of the step the stronger it gets, finally you reach the edge and the smell almost knocks you out, thank god it didn't though, right below you are two black leather shoes, you back up a few steps to catch your breath.

At your size the smell is incredibly strong, but to a normal person it could be barely noticable if at all, you build up the courage to go over tothe edge again, the smell is as strong as ever but you peer over the edge again. Only one pair of shoes, it seems the woman is the only one that lives here, if you had to guess it would probably be because of the extremely smelly feet you joke to yourself. As you're thinking about how to get diwn you lose your balance for a second and...
15121.title: The coat you're in is hung up

choices: You make it out safe and search for the giantess
151212.content:
You stumble backwards from the edge of the step and fall onto your back, that was close, even though you're still one inch tall the shoes you almost just fell into were more of boots than shoes, as well as how high you'd have to climb, the smell would also male ot nearly impossible to get out.
You regain your energy and stand up, you need to find a way down the step that won't hurt you, your attention goes back to the boots.
No, there has to be some other way, looking around the hallway there's nothing close enough that might allow you to climb down, or cushion your fall other than the boots.
For a thord time you slowly creep up to the edge being careful not to get too close, as you observe the leather boots you notice that one of the boots is on its side and you make your decision.
You sit down on the ledge and push off with your legs, your fall is perfectly executed and you land on the soft leather of the right boot.

Immediately after you land you notice the familiar smell yet again and it's even stronger than before, as you struggle to get off the boot your nose already starts adjusting to the smell, after around 30 seconds of trying yo get off you notice the smell isn't as bad as you initially thought it was.
As you slide off the side of the boots you decide to walk around the boot laying on it's side and make your way to what is the top of the boot where most of the smell seems to be coming from.
When you reach the entrance you can tell for certain that this is where the smell is coming from, out of curiosity you decide to step inside the cave like boot, the smell keeps getting stronger than you think is possible, must have something to do with being tiny you assume.
After half a minute of slowly walking down the boot you reach the bottem where the sole of the foot would go, you try to get a closer look but end up tripping on a seam and getting a mouthfull of old sweat.
Pushin yourself back off the sole of the shoe you spit out as much foot sweat as you can but you'll probably never get the taste of this finnish woman's foot out of your mouth.

After a few moments of standing around in the boot you snap back to your senses and realize that although it's still night, being in the boot you run the risk of the woman coming back and putting them on to go get a midnight snack or something.
151212.title: Regain your balance and back up

choices: Upper body, her face is up there
1512121.content:
You step out of the boot still astonished by how big it is compared to you, as you look around you breath in comparatively fresh air and turn to look down the hallway, the hallway goes strait down for a few meters and turns left to where you assume the kitchen, living room, and bedroom are.
You decide to start your journey, at this size it could take some time before you get to the end of the hall, let alone where the finnish giantess is but better start now than never.
You begin your walk, as you walk though you notice how much more detail you can notice at this size, what would be a barely noticable grain of sand or speck of dirt is at least the size of a softball but if you continue to shrink you can expect them to get a lot bigger.
At around half way you can make out something coming from what you assume is the living room down the hall, with your small ears you can make out much quieter noises, it sounds like a news channel and it's definately finnish.

Nearing the end of your long walk you turn where the hallway also turns and now see a living room, the back of a massive couch faces you nearby and behind it you assume is the television.
Shifting your view to the left side of the living room you see what must be the kitchen and another doorway sits beside the tv and leads to the bedroom.
Although it's hard to hear it past the television you can hear a soft snoring noise coming drom the couch and you also spot a foot hanging off the side, to get help you'll have to get this woman's attention and to do that you'll have to get to her.
You begin your second long journey except this one isn't so far, while walking towards the couch you notice every single thing on the floor around you, to the right of you when you first entered the room you spotted a rolled up old sock and a little further ahead you can see the bag from some fast food resteraunt leaned up against the back of thr couch.
Soon you reach the back of the couch, you decide to start your climb at the front so it will be easier, you walk over to the front and look up at the giantess, she's asleep looking peaceful as ever, you decide to begin your climb up closer to her...
1512121.title: Hallway-trip

15121212.content:
No chances will be taken, you are so close to finally getting the finnish giantess's attention and you're not going to be stopped by getting stuck to her massive feet or her rolling over you and gettin you stuck to her or the couch.
You start the third long walk although this one os drastically less far than the other two, as you walk there you notice what was probably once inside of the fast food bag you saw earlier.
A half eaten burger and a few french fries litter the ground, on the wrapping you see 'McDonald'sin' you don't speak finnish but you can tell that the good ol' US of A is here too.
As you near the half eaten meal you hear your stomache growl, it then hits you how hungry you are, the whole reason this happened was because you were trying to get some food and you never did.
You stand up next to the burger, even a simple burger is two times your height, but you're absolutely starving so you dig in anyways.

Tearin off a small chunk of meat you take a bite out of it and almost immediately taste a sort of mint flavour, taking a look at the chunk you can't see it but the giantess behind you probably left quite alot of saliva behind when she bit in, you decide to just go with it and keep eating, you're starving and some spit won't kill you.
Patting your stomach, you turn around to look at the giant finnish woman, seeing that she's still there you decide to continue your journey.
With a full stomach your walk goes quicker than you expected it to, and before you know it you're at the foot of the couch, above you the absolutely massive finn sleeps on oblivious to what is happening just below her.
Luckily the fabric is old and frayed, it's alo easier to climb that way as there's alot more handholds to climb easier and faster.
Around half way up you feel a cold sensation all over you around every four or five seconds, you look up and can see the giantess's sleeping face hanging off the front side of the couch and you realize that even half way down the couch you can still feel her breath quite clearly.

Eventually you reach the top of the couch and pull yourself over, standing up strait you see before you the colossal body of the finnish woman, she's absolutely beautiful, you shake your head though, you need help from her.
You make your way over to her face and you yet again can't believe how small you are to everything, you hurt your neck as you look up to see her entire face, it's imposing at this size but you clear your throat anyways.
"Hey! Down here! Help me please!" you yell as loud as you can, does she hear you?
15121212.title: Tough climb

choices: She takes you into her bedroom
151212121.content:
As you await for an answer from the massive woman that you're standing right next to you look at her eyes, sideways you're about as tall as the eye.
Suddenly it opens almost instantly and looks around, spotting your opportunity to finally get found you begin jumping up and down waving your hands everywhere.
Soon they eyes lock onto you and all attention is focused on you, as the eye looks at you it seems to take a moment before reacting, suddenly the head raises up at lightspeed and the woman is sitting up strait staring at you with a look of disbelief.
You stand there frozen in fear, maybe she thinks your a bug, but shifting your sttention back to the giantess her mouth slowly opens and she mutters under her breath, "Mikä, sinä olet..."
You then remember the language barrier, she was finnish after all, you decide to play it friendly and wave to her, but this only stsrtles her. Ore and she scrambles off the couch and wanders into the kitchen muttering more words in finnish
She will likely come back you figure so you move further onto the couch so as to not get knocked off accidentally, when you're further in on the couch you feel a familiar warmth and a familiar smell, you likely remember from your time in the coat.

Eventually after what you assume was walking around in circles and muttering to herself, the finnish giantess returns and peeks aroundthe corner of the couch to look at you, when you turn around to face her she retreats to the back side of the couch.
After you hear a deep breath from the backside of the couch the giantess stands up and walks around to the front of the couch and looks at you still seeming cautious about you at best.
She cautiously inches closer and closer to you, you then decide to wave again, "Hei pieni kaveri..." is all she responds with in a cautious but still frightened tone.
Eventually she takes another deep breath and she cautiously kneels down maintaining eye contact the entire time, when she is settled on the ground you clear your throat and yell, "Hey! Can you help me please? I've shrunken some how!"
She just returns a look of confusion, she either doesn't understand english or didin't hear you, "Miten sait niin pienen?" she asks leaning in forward.
Again, you don't speak finnish so you're obviously confused by what she's saying, "Do you speak any english?" you ask to her on a whim.
At hearing the word english her eyes light up, "How are you so tiny?" she asks in a heavy but understandible accent, "I don't know, but I need your help!" you reply.
She nods a little bit but seems to only have understood bits and peices by the puzzled look on her face, "You need help? I help you." she says, at least she understood the help part.
You nod, seeing this she holds out her hand and gives a reasurring smile, she may barely understand you but she's offering you help and you'll take any you can get at this point.
She will likely co
151212121.title: Her eyes open

choices: One stripe tall! (half of an inch)
Half a stripe tall! (quarter of an inch)
15122.content:
Your eyes open, it's still dark inside the coat pocket, it's still warm, and there's still the familiar sound of gurgling coming from the stomach, you assume since it's only a three hour flight the woman didn't want to spend any money until she got home. Taking a deep breath, you exhale and stand up, although you can't see it you know which way is up and decide to begin climbing, already you notice it's taking a lot longer to get up then you thought it would, you must be tired, you couldn't have slept more than an hour so you decide that's why. Eventually after a minute or two of climbing you reach the top of the inner coat pocket, you look around, the light coming in from the unzipped center of the coat illuminates how much further you need to go. As you look up you realize that the way up looks a lot further than it did before, putting it together, the longer climb, the louder noises, and the much louder noises in general you realize that you must be smaller!

Looking at the undershirt that you're up against you compare yourself with the navy blue and white stripes you conclude that you are smaller! before when you were climbing into the shirt from the outside you were 1 inch tall, 2 stripes tall, you stand strait as you can up against the shirt leaning on it with your feet on the top of the coat pocket. You stand as strait as you can and look at the stripes, you are horrified to see that you're now just...
15122.title: You're still in the coat with the woman but...

choices: Her vagina a few feet from your face
You roll with enough momentum and are lodged in her crack
151222.content:
At first you're horrified, you find yourself unable to move, but after thinking it over and over again you slowly calm down. Things could've been worse, they always could've been worse, at least you're not less than a quarter of an inch tall. You find yourself thinking alot more about it though, how are you going to get the giantess's attention? At this point by how small you are you should probably start referring to this finnish woman as a goddess, by now she's way bigger than a giantess to you. You might not be able to even get her attention at this size but you might as well try, if worst comes to worst you could probably survive for quite a long time on her body just by eating toe jam and drinking sweat or something, but you push this thought to the back of your head, you don't wan't to think about it right now.

During all your thought you hadn't realized that the plane was landing in Helsinki though. As the unaware finnish goddess stands up to get off the plane you were still leaning on her shirt and by extention her stomach with your feet on the top rim of the inner pocket.
As she stands up you are put at a more vertical angle and lose your position sill not understanding what's happening. Suddenly you slip, you scramble to grab onto anything but it's too late and you start falling as you look down you realize you're falling stait out of the bottem of the coat and strait back into the waistband of the pants. Reaching your arms out for anything you touch the top of the pants as you're halfway into the base but as you try to grab it your hand touches i and is instantly in pain due to the momentum o you falling. You grasp your arm as you fall blindly into the finnish goddess's pants and underwear, you take one last look at the light up above before you skide down the abyss unable to stop yourself, you keep rolling and sliding around the underwear, soon you come to a slow stop, tryin to stand up as you brush yourself off you look up to see...
151222.title: Half a stripe tall! (quarter of an inch)

choices: The steward sees you and takes yiu
You are lumped together with a bunch of snacks and people are hungry
1513.content:
While holding on only by having your leg stick in her waistband, the giantess turns around to leave something on her chair, while bending over you slip free and fall right into her chair. Turning around the finnish giantess turns around again and walks to the bathroom leaving you stranded on her chair with what you find to be a purse or handbag. While walking towards it you notice the warmth of the chair that the giantess left behind, quickly making your way to the purse you jump up and grip the side o it pulling yourself in, sighing as sigh of relief you now don't have to worry about being sat on when the giantess returns.

As you start to relax in the purse you notice something that you're leaning on, a wallet! Opening it you find the giantess's ID, but before you can read it you and the wallet are pulled out of the purse, the giantess is buying a snack and hands you over to the steward along with three dollars. Landing on the tray you look around to realize...
1513.title: Something else

152.content:
Turning around you see a shoe headed straight for you hit the ground right in front of you, impulsively you climb onto the front of the shoe before it lifts up into the air again. You cling on for dear life as the woman's pace quickens, you notice that she might be headed to the flight and realize your mistake of climbing onto her foot as she could unknowingly take you to a country or city in the middle of nowhere and you'd have no way of getting back, but with her quickening pace the act of getting off her foot is nearly impossible without harming yourself. For the time being all you can do is cling on to the foot of a giantess like a mere bug in her presence, you decide not to risk jumping off as that would leave you in a worse situation than you're already in, against your better judgement you stay on the shoe of the giantess and see where it takes you. All you can do is grasp onto the woman's shoe and press yourself against it to stop yourself from falling off but eventually the rhythm of walking slows to a stop when the woman stops at the checkpoint to board the airplane, you jolt upwards seeing a way off the shoe but as quickly as it stopped the foot starts moving again and your hopes of getting off before the flight begins are dashed yet again.

Eventually the woman gets to her seat and stops to sit down, looking up from her shoe your heart sinks as you observe your surroundings, in the seats surrounding you are asians and when you look up at the main sign of the flight it reads [London to Tokyo 14 hour flight]
Looking up at the woman who's shoe you hitchhiked here on you see that she's an asian woman...
152.title: A flight to the other side of the world

1522.content:
Looking up at the asian giantess and back at the surrounding passangers you decide to get this one's help, she's the closest to you seeing as you are standing on her foot and she seems safe enough.
You step forwards towards her leg when your foot gets stuck, it got caught in between the lacing of the woman's beat up sneakers but you manage to pull your foot out easily enough and continue.
It isn't long at all before you reach the bend where her foot arches up into her leg, you step forwards without paying much attention when suddenly your foot is caught on another lace sending you forwards over the lip of her shoe and head first down the side of her shoe in between her sweaty foot and her weathered sneaker.
Immediately you begin to struggle but this only serves to wedge you deeper inbetween her foot and her shoe, as you slide further in the dirt and sweat rubs off onto your body and all over your face, coated in the woman's foot sweat and wedged into her shoe you give up struggling to rest your body for a moment.

You need to get out of here before the giant asian wakes up and starts walking around or you're in big trouble assuming she is sleeping right now, your brainstorming is cut short though as you start to feel less pressure on your body.
With more space coming from seemingly nowhere you slip a bit more until you slow to a stop as your face finally reaches the sole of the woman's shoe getting even more foot sweat in your face and some on your lips taunting you with the fact that your arms are still pinned to your sides.
As you lose more pressure somehow your arms are freed and the rest of your body slides down the side of the shoe, you do your best to stand up between the inner side of the woman's shoe and her foot you realize why you've been mysteriously slipping free of the pressure of being inside a shoe; you're shrinking!
At this height you're no more than ____ of an inch, you have to get out of the shoe if you can or else you might be stuck with the giantess' colossal sweaty foot for at least 14 hours if not for the rest of your life should it come to an untimely end!
1522.title: A young adult (20-30 years old)

choices: Accept your position and worship the foot...
Come back to your senses, get out of here, escape!
15223.content:
You're surprised you didn't notice it before now but you've shrunk, a lot more by that.
You can stand up to your full height unobstructed but that isn't exactly a good thing, at this size you can see straight through the the small holes in the damp stingey sock to the colossal foot on the other side.
Every speck of dirt, every imperfection, every bead of sweat, you see it all and find yourself entranced the asian's foot, you find yourself creeping closer and leaning through a hole in the sock to touch the foot, you've always liked feet since as early as you can remember and this would be the perfect opportunity to worship the foot of a random asian woman from the airport, at this point she's more like a goddess to you.
You can't help but lean in and lick the foot just slightly to get a taste for it, you can almost feel the individual peices of salt with your toungue as you embrace the tangy cheese like taste, you give the skin a deep kiss before suddenly your trance is broken.
You shake your head, did I really just make out with a foot? You ask yourself, but you look back at it, it felt so right, it felt like this is your place now, to love and worship the asian goddess' foot, you are less than a bug, you are unworthy to even worship it but you want to anyways, you shake your head, you still need to get out of here right? But...
15223.title: The foot of a.goddess

info.brief_description: You shrink in an airport where people from all over the world connect.
info.description:
Right then, so here I am perusing through GTS/shrunk stories, when I realize that there really are not all that many foreign women in these stories. Sure, there are some Asian women, but where are the Indian girls? The Arab girls? The African Girls? The Europeans? The South American? These girls are often even hotter than your standard blonde bombshell, and it is time that we recognize that.
So, this story is all about those beautiful women that are so often forgotten about. I wont ban American girls, but I definitely want to focus on women from everywhere.

Let's establish some rules shall we?
- Check your grammar and spelling.
- Try to write a paragraph or two. I understand if the chapter is short for certain choices, but in general, try to keep it no shorter than a paragraph.
- Please follow 2nd person (you) POV when writing. You are allowed to switch to the women's perspective.
- No guys other than the main character. If there is a family, mommy will be leading the family, and daddy should be kept out.
- No animal interaction. This isn't a furry story, or an anthro story, just focus on humans.
- The women can be aware or unaware, and can have any sort of behavior you want them to have.
- The women ARE allowed to leave the airport when they get to where they want to go.
- Sex, and just about every fetish, ARE ALLOWED AND ENCOURAGED.
- Death is allowed. ANY sort of death IS allowed: Digestion, squished, crushed, anything.
- Death is not required however. You could have any sort of immunity.
-On that note, Digestion and Scat are allowed, please do show what happens after he goes down the throat.
